subject: Ethics

description: A short lesson to help you apply Indigenous Environmental Wisdom.

hook.text: Aboriginal Australians managed forests with fire for 60,000 years. Western settlers called it primitive.

punchline.text: The 'new' idea in environmental law is actually ancient.
